name: Hubris
summary:
🚨 Patch 2.0 Arena mode live now! 🚨

Even more Meta Quest 3 enhancements added!

⭐ “An epic sci-fi adventure that no VR gamer should miss out playing” - VR Without Parole

Take on the mantle of an unseasoned recruit with the task of finding a high-profile agent who went missing on a strange and highly inhospitable alien planet. 

 🏆 WN Unreal Engine best VR Game
 🏆 UploadVR's best desktop game
 🏆 Belgium Game Awards Best XR game
